Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text:
The food was very good, i like the menu that it is very unique with the toppings and sauces they use.
Would just say its a bit unorganized. ‚Ä¶

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text:
I do not recommend this place.

We told the waitress before sitting down that wanted a small snack and a beer ‚Ä¶

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text:
Cool place! Design is very hip. They do a small selection of beers on tap but they are all nice and there's some variety.
One thing I really enjoyed was how many female staff there are. So often the ‚Ä¶

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: I came here on the recommendation of my colleague Matthew Holden after an intense climbing session. We sampled many of the beers which we nice. There was 14 taps to choose from. I also ordered some of the fries which were fantastic and ‚Ä¶

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Staff were friendly but the first round of beer already took a while and our waiter informed us of a long wait for food. But at least once the food comes it should be hot, however we got cold fries after 1 hour. The burgers were not much ‚Ä¶

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Amazing little gem. Worth a visit and their beer selection was phenomenal üëå

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text:
Great vibe, excellent home-brewed beers, and they share the venue with the best burger place in Amsterdam, so doesn't get any better.
Staff was a bit overwhelmed (on a busy Sunday evening) so our drinks took a while, but still they were very friendly and reacted quickly when we asked about them again.

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: A nice spot for some craft beers and yummy food. Altogether was a nice experience with a group of friends.

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Nice beers if enough patience you‚Äôve got. However, the burgers will take longer than an hour, be ready for that, and be ready for ‚Äòno sorry‚Äô for any mistake of the staff. Moreover, the staff might inform you that they forgot about some ‚Ä¶

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: The beers are really nice, no doubt about that, but the service is awful. Understaffed or not, there is no excuse for being impolite, nor much excuse either for taking half an hour to take a simple order of three plain drinks, then even ‚Ä¶

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: It's definitely worth heading over the river to visit Oedipus if you can. It feels a little bit out of the way but do go. There is a good selection of beers on tap (and bottled). They serve really good burgers and have a range of snacks ‚Ä¶

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Very tasty beer üç∫ especially IPA & Pilsner üëåüëå they do the best burgers in town and the interior is very cosy & unique. It‚Äôs worh to visit north to hang out in this place. Great alternative to meet friends, enjoy beer and good beer food with nice music.

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Not a pleasant experience, not recommended at all. The service was very slow, it took them 1 hour to bring our food and when they did, two of my friends‚Äô burgers were not served because they were out of ingredients. They informed us only ‚Ä¶

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: nice place for drinking some craft beer in the afternoon.  everyone was really friendly and the food was delicious.  one of the best burgers in my life.  can really recommend it.

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Very bad service. We have waited for very long time to get our order, and it turned out that 2 of our friends could not get their meal because the ingredients were not available. This information has been communicated only after asking for ‚Ä¶

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Amazing beers and friendly service. The Beef Chief burgers are a perfect addition to the beers. Pias Tropical is a seasonal selection and my personal favorite. Very cool warehouse setting.

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Amazing range of experimental and classic beers, really cool venue and friendly staff. Definitely pop in and try something new!

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Two of our order didn't come on time we waited for at least 1 hour and still received a very bad treatment without any apologise. Staff and the manager was very rude to us. Worst experience I had in a burger place in NL

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Went there for a tasting in a group of 6, really cool, laid back environment. One of the owners gave us a tour in the brewery and told us a lot about their history. Really nice beers, very unique experience

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: There was a good selection of beers and they all came in fun colourful glasses. We visited mid-afternoon on a Saturday and there was a good atmosphere without being too busy. The decor was bright and cheerful and we enjoyed our beverages.

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Great, eclectic little place. Tons of different beers on tap and available in bottles. Prices are extremely reasonable also! Check it out!

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Excellent quality craft beer in a very cozy tap room next to the brewery. The food (tried the burger) was also delicious.

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Food is good. But the service was awful. Two friends had to wait 30+ min to get their burgers after everyone else already finished their food.

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Great industrial harbor area atmosphere with great and some strange beers. Great burgers from a food truck in the weekend.

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Well worth the trek over using the free ferry from Centraal station! Interesting beers, tasty burgers, and lovely patio! Accommodating to infants, too(they had high chairs).

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: I mean have you had cheese fries before you had these? Nope no you haven‚Äôt. So. Good. ‚Ä¶

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Super nice atmosphere, good location in Noord next to Jumbo foodmarket for a pizza and afterwards delicious Oedipus own brewed beer in the sun (Thai Thai beer is our favorite)!

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Food is ok but the staff was very rude. I would never come again. They failed to mention that they didn't have ingredients to make my burger. All my friends ate and I waited 1 hour more for my order. The staff didn't even apologize for that.

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Beer tasted fine and the place is very hipster, which might be appealing for a lot of people. They got some interesting beer choices, if you are into small brewery definitely check this out.

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: just amazing! great beer, lekker food, relaxed ambiance. perfect spot

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Awesome brewery with a fantastic atmosphere. Highlight of the day in Amsterdam - easily whiled away a few hours here, sitting in the sun and drinking some damn fine brews. Kinda compares to Beavertown/Pressure Drop in London.

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Great burgers and even greater beer. Nice service and relaxed atmosphere.  Unfortunately it's only open Thursday to Sunday. Recommended!

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Lovely place with great vibes and amazing beers! Huge shout out to the crew members for offering me a beer after spilling nearly whole glass of mine.. :))) will definitely pop in when im back in Amsterdam!

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Good vibes only! Amazing selection of brews, great indoor and outdoor areas and the food is twisted good! Great beer session area - thanks for having us!

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Best hamburger in Amsterdam! Double smash crazy juicy with melted cheese. Delicious cheese fries and a great variety of beers.

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Love this alternative place in the North of Amsterdam. Spacecious brewery where it's nice to chill outside if the weather allows it of course! The special beers all have their funky etiquettes and are mostly served from tap. Good selection of tasteful beers!

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Cool warehouse brewery with outdoor seating. Interesting artwork, awesome staff, great selection of beers. Ocasional events

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: This place is great! I love their beers, branding looks amazing, space is huge and the vibe is something not to be missed while being in Amsterdam! Definetely coming back once I‚Äôm again in Amsterdam! Aha, and the burgers are quite tasty üëçüèª

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Great beer with lots of varieties, adventuresome food and a fun atmosphere. The bartender was helpful, fast and friendly. It‚Äôs a little off the beaten path from downtown Amsterdam, but worth the trek.

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Delicious beer and food! Bit pricy but worth a visit. Quite crowded on the weekends. Must visit for beer fans!

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: When the kitchen decides to close 10 mins earlier, they should inform the staff so that the waiters avoid the embarrassment of canceling the orders. However, good beer and coasters.

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Great place with nice selection of locally brewed beers.

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Great brewery and delicious food. The staff is friendly and it has a great atmosphere. Order the chicken sandwich!

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Amazing burgers and Oedipus beers. Can you ask for more?

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Original design and identity, full marks for that. Bar staff vary from too cool to talk to really nice and friendly. Unconventional beer names and bright coloured spaces create a hip post kitchvibe. Been here many times because friends love ‚Ä¶

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: i‚Äôve been wanting to go here for quite some time as i‚Äôm a huge fan of the beers‚Äîfinally made it this weekend. great food, amazing vibes. special thanks to Kate for being extra lovely and helping us move inside when it got chilly even though everything was reserved!

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Great micro brewery with passionate staff and great beer. We took the brewery tour at 15 on a Sunday and enjoyed it a lot.

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: It's an industrial feel brew pub that offers a wide variety of delicious beers, both more classic and different (in a good way). As of writing (Feb 20) they were relocating the kitchen which made the food choice more limited, however the ‚Ä¶

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Great selection of craft beers with burgers from Beef Chief (Straight to Hell was my choice, no regrets) to complement those. It's located in an industrial space with cool vibe and colours. Can definitely recommend to make a trip over the river for this.

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Food...sublime! Great chicken wings and delicious Chicken burger with a huge side of gangnam fries cannot go wrong!

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Very nice beer and small snacks which are super tasty!

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: A great Brewery that also serves food! Don't forget that this place is a brewery first, which can be quite hard when the burgers are SOOO good, however ... Beer first, burgers second! Loved this place!! Would highly recommend it! Also keep ‚Ä¶

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Great hamburger, beer, and ambiance

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Great beers. Worth the trek out of the city. As an American who loves microbreweries, this hit the spot!

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: The service was very slow, but the beer worth it. Try kamikaze fries, they are loaded with kimchi. Genius!

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Nice discovery in the outskirts of Amsterdam: good + original beers and burgers!

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: I am a wine drinker, but when we went here and had a chat with one of the managers here, they said - ppl who say that are not a beer drinker, just haven found the beer for them. On top of that, learning how they integrate all these ‚Ä¶

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: People might overlook this amazing brewery in North Amsterdam, writing it off because it is out of the way. DON‚ÄôT DO IT! The craft beer is delicious, the staff is extremely friendly and the surrounds in the brewery comfortable and ‚Ä¶

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Americans (and craft brew lovers) take note - this is the kind of place you are used too. Several sour options, as well as others, that taste excellent. Plus good food and a lively atmosphere. Well worth the subway ride over the canal. By far my favorite in Amsterdam. I hope to be back to try more of these brews!

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Living in the neighbourhood, we walked to the recently openend Oedipus bar at Javaplein in Amsterdam Oost. When we arrived, we were asked to wait as a table for three didn't open up yet. No problem, because we were keen to check the new bar ‚Ä¶

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Great place with tasty beers, great burgers (courtesy of the Beef Chief) and a wonderful vibe. Also been to a few of the special events which attract a great crowd. ‚Ä¶

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Definitely a rowdier brewery but we had a blast! Cool decor, marketing, music, and ambiance. Expect a hybrid between a club and a brewery. The beer selection was also really good!

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Really cool vibe - awesome staff,  interesting selection of beers, tasty burgers and fries and some fun events! Check it out!

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Beer is okay, service isn't. Got there at 8 o'clock, ordered beer. Went to the table, looked at the menu, tried to order food... Kitchen closed since 8 o'clock. Sorry guys, but if you serve new customers at 8 o'clock, either ask them if ‚Ä¶

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Pure brilliance. We took to the time to head out here and we weren't disappointed. Colourful tap room with excellent outdoor space (paddling pool, fairly lights, palm trees). Friendly atmosphere and helpful staff - the food was good too. The beers.....well that goes without saying (but I will): Fantastic as expected from Oedipus

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Two Years ago one one my fav burger places in Amsterdam. Sadly it totally turned bad. Burger was cold and after complaints they redid it and served it cold again. also quality went worse and greasy. for 50 euros its absolutely bold to serve ‚Ä¶

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Great beer and a cozy, relaxed environment inside an industrial building. Had some amazing burgers and regrouped before moving on. Would definitely return. This place is worth the ferry ride/walk over to North Amsterdam.

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Exactly what you would expect, younger crowd no one here was above 30.  It's similar to what you think of when a teenager sets up a garage for a party, but there's delicious beer on tap, and huge brewing vats in the background. Came a bit ‚Ä¶

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Excellent variety of beer, brewery is on premises. Friendly owner, unique setup, colorful and cheerful ambience with good music. More than 10 beers fresh on tap and a lot more in the bottle menu. Its a hidden gem of Amsterdam.

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text:
It's something you will not find in the city. Exciting new beers englobed by a modern/crazy concept. Best option to get a break from the city life and enjoy a good time with friends. I highly require the brewery to stay like this and not transform into a touristic overcrowded place.:)
Thanks.

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Selection of beers in this brewery has a sense of humor, but flavor wise they're great. The brewery tour could've been better organized as it was too loud to hear the guide properly. A microphone would be helpful, or to stand in a more quiet area of the brewery.

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: One of the upcoming breweries in the city. Very tasty beers and you can also see the factory and tanks, so very nice specially for beer freaks. These aren't main factors, but sofas were very comfortable too and there is free wifi. ‚Ä¶

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Fun brew pub north of city center. Easy walk from the metro. A variety of beers on tap. Fries were piping hot and delicious (if a bit stubby)

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Great little brewery the beers here are quite unique. I tried about 5 of them and they were delicious. Prices are well worth it. The beers are about 8%, so 5 was enough. Staff are very cool.

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: First day of summer. Glad I finally visited. Great atmosphere and a beer selection to be proud of.

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Very good draft beer, a lot of recipes and flavours. Fries and burgers are fantastic. Very good prices but the service is not the best - worth going anyways. Cheerful crowd, young and fun place to have drinks and eat.

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: A must visit for craft beer fans. Wide selection of beers and food is quite good too! This place can be quite busy on weekends and in sunny weather, but no problem - that only adds up to the good vibe! :)

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: For drinks Oedipus is great. They know how to brew for sure. The concept is from the heart, you can tell that once you get into their bar. So yes, their beer is good and special. But.... The food is not nice. Our burger was (too) raw, the ‚Ä¶

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Great selection of beers. Very relaxed and also decent food

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Great little brewery. The venue is an open warehouse style building that houses the brewing facilities too. A nice selection of 10 or so Oedipus beers. Good for groups, not good for non-beer drinkers.

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Beer is unusual and place looks cool, but portions of food are very small, we waited for our order for an hour, beer costs 10 eur

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Small brewery just slightly out of the city center. This place has amazing beers brewed by passionate people. Definitely worth the visit if you're in the neighbourhood. ‚Ä¶

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Great place, amazing beers üëç

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Great tap room at the Brewery! You probably already know their beer is good. The food is good too, nice to get off the beaten path.

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Truly exceptional craft brewers making special, subtle beers with a great deal of love and commitment. Coming from Portland, Oregon, I am spoiled for choice in beer but this is a worthy destination. Food available after 5pm...

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Lovely beers, cool atmosphere!

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: These guys make great beers! Their events are always a blast. It‚Äôs great to be able to peek into the brewery while also enjoying the interesting decor and alternative vibe.

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Very relaxed place with alternative vibe, very friendly and helpful staff. The brewery makes really really good beers!! try the burgers here, they are just amazing!

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: One of the better beer spots, because the Beef Chief is also here.

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: The third brewing location of the Oedipus Brewing company is only just up and running. Their tap room offers a fine selection of their own brews as well as one or two collaborations with other breweries. The atmosphere is nice and relaxed and the staff know their beers.

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Really awesome artisan beers with funky names and fantastic ingredients, all made here, at this great place! Now and then they organise special events. Check their website for those or just walk in from Thursdays till sundays, from 15h till late.

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Lots of great beers, a complete wheel of styles, absolutely love it. The food is adventurous and very well done, gorgeous burgers and fries.

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Great place to have locally brewed beers. Location is also convenient. Just two stops plus 6 mins walking from Central Station Amsterdam. I really recommend you to the "Thai Thai"!

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Great Beers! Great Vibe. This place seems like it would fit right in Austin Texas. The food is pretty killer and goes well with their brews.

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text:
Always great vibes!
Incredible smash burgers.

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Visiting Amsterdam, we four homebrewers wanted adventure, so we took the free ferry to Noord Amsterdam and GPS'd our way to Oedipus where we stayed two hours sampling, quaffing, and supping. Their burgers were really good. Their twelve ‚Ä¶

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Great atmosphere, feels just like any brewery on the west coast of north america, very laid back. Great beer, west coast IPA could be hoppier though. Who'd have though Thai spice would go so well with a tripel!

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: A very cool artisenal brewery, they have a (very) large range of beers you have probably never had before. They are overly creative with their naming and with their ingredients, my personal favorite is the Thai Thai version!

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: All the beers here are delicious. You can taste the West Coast (California) influence, but with a unique added flair. A must visit for home brewers and craft beer enthusiasts.

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: As much as I like this place, it is highly disappointing. It is reported to be open at 14:00 - but the kitchen is not open till 16:00. This is not reported anywhere, which made me come all the way up North. It's so easy to update your ‚Ä¶

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Cozy, colorful, beautiful place. Good beers, and nice people too. In some afternoons/evenings they have nice burgers, with good vegetarian options.

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Very unique concept beers. Fresh Beer Friday is a hit.

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: If you're a fan of local microbreweries this is a must visit. An excellent varying selection of home brewn beers in an old warehouse. Cool place to get away from the regular tourist traps.

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Fun place.  Looks like a converted warehouse.  Beers are great.  The burgers and fries are very good.  Some unusual, yet surprisingly good fries (e.g. with Korean kimchi).

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Great craft brewery with a very chill and hip vibe, and diverse selection of beers. Great business that is helping make North Amsterdam cool.

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Enjoyed some delicious local beers and probably the best chips of my life. Do visit if you're in the area - it's a vibrant place with plenty of character.

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Super good burgers and fries, the best beer (and what a variety!!!) And super friendly staff. No coffee though.

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Awesome place with great beer and food! Super nice atmosphere inside and outside

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Besides the beer, the service by the so called "owner" was beyond rude. So the kitchen was closed and the  BBQ wasn't going to be put on until 5pm, it was 3:45pm and well the only food they have behind the bar are roasted almonds and well ‚Ä¶

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Best burgers (meat) I am reliably informed... veggie options ok too. Beers delicious! Great vibe and welcoming staff

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: One of my favorites brewery in Amsterdam, escaping from the normal blond beer, these guys brew a kind of IPA American style beer which makes unique in town. The selection they have it's remarkable.

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Superb beers,  worth the trip from the city and easy to find. Only downside no low calorie soft drinks for my tee total partner but damn good flavoured limonade !

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Very  well decorated inside and out. Nice selection of beer. Some nice selection of fries to go with your beer, a lovely combination.

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Great selection of beers, nice bug open space in taproom and outdoor seating. As far as taprooms go, it's a winner and worth the short trek from central Amsterdam

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Brewer was fab but the restaurant inside the brewery  is pretty terrible. The chips are veeeeery bad but the burgers are quite good

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Really, really lousy service. The girl behind the bar (Leigh) was extremely rude for no reason. ‚Ä¶

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Great beers good food. Surprised by burger

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: A local brewery with some interesting beers (and if you don't like beer... try the "Stoute Cola"!). Easy to commute to by bike, and bus; if you need to do some groceries, Jumbo Foodmarkt Amsterdam is next this brewery.

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Oww so yummmmy and cozy

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: I honestly love Oedipus, Mannenlifde and Swingers are my favorite beers.  I absolutely love the burgers and fries easily the best I've had in the city.

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text:
Everything for fresh beer lovers and juicy burgers eaters.
Authentic interior of the real brewery and friendly atmosphere.

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Cool and trendy atmosphere, great beers and fries plus some games laying around in case you get bored.

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Best burgers and fries ever. Oh and bloody tasty beers. Well worth the 69 Kilometers one way drive.

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Great craft beer in a very unique setting.

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Had a fantastic afternoon here whilst visiting Amsterdam for Dekmantel festival 2018. They make some of the best beer I've ever tasted and the food was decent.

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Super chill brewery with some basic but good food. The beer is top notch.

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Cool taproom, ok beer

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Amazing experience. Great beer options. Good prices. Cool atmosphere

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Best beers east of the Mississippi ü§ò

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Nice, upbeat, place. Great beers. Friendly crowd. Little hard to get to if you don't live in Amsterdam Noord.

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Lots of great beers, a complete wheel of styles, absolutely love it. The food is adventurous and very well done, gorgeous burgers and fries.

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: As much as I like this place, it is highly disappointing. It is reported to be open at 14:00 - but the kitchen is not open till 16:00. This is not reported anywhere, which made me come all the way up North. It's so easy to update your ‚Ä¶

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Besides the beer, the service by the so called "owner" was beyond rude. So the kitchen was closed and the  BBQ wasn't going to be put on until 5pm, it was 3:45pm and well the only food they have behind the bar are roasted almonds and well ‚Ä¶

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Fun place.  Looks like a converted warehouse.  Beers are great.  The burgers and fries are very good.  Some unusual, yet surprisingly good fries (e.g. with Korean kimchi).

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Nice, upbeat, place. Great beers. Friendly crowd. Little hard to get to if you don't live in Amsterdam Noord.

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: It's the great beers that have gotten their own place! Smell the malt and barley, or just taste one of the +/-20 results

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Really awesome artisan beers with funky names and fantastic ingredients, all made here, at this great place! Now and then they organise special events. Check their website for those or just walk in from Thursdays till sundays, from 15h till late.

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Nice, cozy place with all the great Oedipus beers and some guest drafts. Not too expensive either.

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Great beers and food (large chips), friendly staff

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: One of my favorites brewery in Amsterdam, escaping from the normal blond beer, these guys brew a kind of IPA American style beer which makes unique in town. The selection they have it's remarkable.

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Nice place and ok beers. Perhaps not worth the trek out to where the brewery is!

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: It's fun place with many types of draft beer. Specious and good for groups of friends

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Unique music venue like no other in Amsterdam. Primarily a brewery. Interesting atmosphere.

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Great selection of local beers at a reasonable price (3.5-5 euros for a .33)!

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: The beer is really not very good. In very disappointed. The atmosphere was okay though.

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Amazing brewery and cool event space. Mama was my favorite very light beer!

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: One of the best breweries in Amsterdam. Must-go for beer lovers.

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Didnt serve food at that time so we came for nothing. They didnt write it and its very disrespectful. And they were also very rude. Bye.

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Nice, cozy place with all the great Oedipus beers and some guest drafts. Not too expensive either.

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Great beers and food (large chips), friendly staff

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Excellent beer! Friendly people and excellent french fries

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Unique place with great beers and super tasty burgers!

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: A lot of different flavors of beer, nice atmosphere, friendly stuff

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Sketchy warehouse tap room with experimental home brews on tap. Not my favorite beer hangout in Amsterdam

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Very nice friendly place, good food and beer

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Great selection of beers in a very cool atmosphere.

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: extremely slow service! Mediocre burgers

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Perfect beers. Perfect burgers!. Kamikaze fries are heavenly!

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Great atmosphere and amazing collection of beers

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: A great place to come and enjoy true craft beer!

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: LOVE THIS BEER NORMALLY BUT THIS PLACE WASNT AS GOOD AND THE SERVICE FOR FOOD WAS SOOOOOO SLOW

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Everything is great - the beer, the food and the ambiance.

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Top shelf beers. Great variety. Awesome glassware

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: A great place for beer lovers. Location is on a small industry place.

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Don‚Äôt go here for the food. Beers are great though. üòò

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Good place and food

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Great atmosphere and delicious taps

Name: Oedipus Brewing
Review Text: Funky is the right word. Beer like you've never tasted.

Name: Oedipus Brewing
